posts.post_title: FS: Lot of T207 Recruit Cards: Davis, Wagner, Walker **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards for sale or trade. Some of these are among the tougher 'Recruit class' cards.

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured (removing SOLD cards for easier viewing):


Walker (card in center - Fact. 606) - $13
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
